thread.title: Reasonably priced for location
thread.title_full: Reasonably priced for location - Review of nyma, the New York Manhattan Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: RonFG
title: Reasonably priced for location
text: We've stayed here multiple times. Great place, if you come up from the DC area on Vamoose. The rooms are clean and relatively large. Not fancy, but how much time do you send in your room, when Manhatten is outside your door? Staff is friendly and helpful. Free breakfast available, but not that good compared to what's available elsewhere.
